ns2:sqlResource.query: SELECT transactions.row_id, transactions.service_id, service.cp_service_name, cp.cp_name, billingid.billing_price, billingid.h3g_billing_priceband, billingid.tim_id_price, billingid.tim_mpay_fraction_id, transaction_id, transactions.msisdn, transactions.billing_id, transactions.creation_date FROM transactions left outer join service on service.service_id = transactions.service_id left outer join cp on cp.cp_id = service.cp_id left outer join billingid on billingid.billing_id = transactions.billing_id
